sections.title: Summary
sections.text: Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of professional experience specializing in Elixir and functional programming. Currently serving as the most senior engineer on a ~10-person team, leading architectural decisions and technical direction. Passionate about maintainable systems, event sourcing, and BEAM ecosystem. Proven track record delivering robust solutions across distributed teams while mentoring engineers and driving technical excellence.

subsections.title: Senior Backend Engineer, Elixir
subsections.subtitle: 7Mind (acquired by 7NXT, Dec 2023)
items: Assumed technical leadership as most senior engineer following departure of staff/principal engineers, guiding architectural decisions and technical direction for 10-person engineering team

Led architectural transformation from distributed microservices to maintainable modulith, reducing operational complexity and improving system reliability across prevention subscription and ZPP certificate services
Designed and implemented event sourcing patterns with CQRS for core business domains, establishing patterns for aggregate design, command handlers, and event-driven workflows
Drove adoption of OTP design patterns across the team, implementing robust supervision trees and leveraging GenServer, GenStage, and GenStatem for fault-tolerant systems
Delivered two new mobile applications from backend inception, coordinating with product, iOS, and Android teams to establish API contracts and integration patterns
Established team processes and ceremonies based on Shape Up methodology, improving cross-squad alignment and delivery predictability
Architected integrations with Contentful CMS, Algolia search indexing, Braze marketing automation, and third-party payment systems
Maintained and evolved Kubernetes infrastructure on GKE, managing Strimzi Kafka operators, Redis clusters, and observability tooling
Technologies: Elixir, Phoenix, Phoenix LiveView, Ecto, OTP, Event Sourcing, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, ArgoCD, Kafka, Redis, PostgreSQL, AWS, Google Cloud, Contentful, Algolia, Braze
